features: 【Retro-style Candle Warmer Lamps for Relaxing】NVRGIUP candle warmer utilizes top-down heat melting technology to melt candles to provide a consistent strong and clean scent. Compared with traditional burning, electric candle warmer can control the melting speed and use time of candles through timing and brightness adjustment, creating a comfortable atmosphere for you to sleep, yoga and read books. Valentine's day gifts for wife lover.

【4 Brightness & Height Adjustment】 Candle Warmer with step-less dimming allows you to adjust the brightness of the bulb.The candle warmer has 4 levels of height temperature adjustable. With an easy turn of the button, the height can be adjusted up to 13.3 inches and lowered to 10.2 inches. Adjust the brightness of the light and control the speed at which the candle melts for the intensity of the scent. Freshen up your room, home, break room, office, kitchen, basement, or anywhere you frequent. The best valentine's day gifts choice for wife girlfriend

【8H Timing Function for Safety】Candle wax warmer obtains fragrance by heating from top to bottom to evenly melt candles. Compared with traditional burning candles, it can achieve no open fire, smokeless, no pollution and reduces fire risk. Moreover, it has a 2/4/8H timing function to ensure safety from burning candles all the time. Two 50W light bulbs are included in the package. ( Candle not included)

【Fit All Size Candles & Perfect Home Decor】The wax warmers with 6.6inch wooden base and height adjustment compatible with all size candles. Good choice for those who are in apartments not allowed open-flame candles. The candle warmer adopts a Retro style design and is a delicate functional decorative lamp, suitable for living rooms, bedrooms, offices, yoga rooms, cafes, etc. It can also be used as a bedside lamp to create a sleep-inducing atmosphere.

【Great Gift Choice for holiday】This Candle Lamp Warmer with exquisite packing gift box will be the best gift choice.It can be a Mother's Day gifts, Christmas gifts, Thanksgiving gifts, Valentine's Day gifts, Birthday gifts, Anniversary gifts, Housewarming gifts to show your love.If any problems, please feel free to contact us for a replacement or full refund. We promise to solve your problems within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Height Adjustment for All Candles 2H/4H/8H Shut-off Timer 2*50W Bulbs

Kindly Reminder: Please do not lit the candle while using the lamp candle warmer.Please ensure that the bulb is fully screwed into the bulb base (until it fails to turn).Please tighten the screw on the knob ring with the attached hexagon wrench after adjusting the height to fix the lamp rod and keep the lampshade from rotating.The aromatic essential oil in the surface candle wax will evaporated after a time of using, to maximize the scent of the candle, please scrap and pour off the molten wax on the surface.Please turn off the power before changing the light bulb. To avoid burns, remove the bulb after it has cooled and replace it with a new one.Please keep candle wax melt lamp out of reach of children and pets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love this candle warmer. I am horrible about forgetting I have a candle burning. This is so much safer. The candles last longer, and I think the smell is more potent.Both large and small candles fit.This candle has a dimmer for the light, a timer, and the shade moves up and down to adjust the scent.I will be ordering more for other rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Its small and cute so can blend in anywhere. Comes with 2 light bulbs so when the first one goes out you have an extra which is handy. It melts the candle and you can smell it without burning it. My teenager loves burning candles but this is a safer option and the candles last way longer than if you were burning them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and love it
reviews.reviewText: Love that there is a timer , don’t have to worry about an open flame. Looks good and provides a decent amount of light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received one of these as a gift and thought, “I don’t need this” and then I tried it! I do need this and so do you if you burn a lot. I love it so much I ordered another one for another room! No more soot, no more trimming and trying to light a Wick, no more worries about nodding off with a candle burning. Great product and very pretty! 🤩

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works and it’s safe
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love candles but I’m a bit afraid to keep the fire on so I bought this for my bedtime. Then I realized that I couldn’t sleep with lights on so I decided to use it in the living room, which turned out perfect.I thought it wouldn’t work in our big living room at first, but it does! The scent is perfect. It also works as a lamp so it makes the room feel cozy at night.This product is smaller than a usual lamp, but if you turn it high, it’s way brighter than a normal one we all have at home. You can choose the brightness you like and adjust the heat depending on how much you want to melt your candle.I love the gold and a bit of retro style, which fits perfectly with my home. I couldn’t give a 5 star because the glass part is leaning towards the candle and wouldn’t stand straight.The price was affordable than the other products on Amazon and the reviews were good, so I had to go for this. I truly recommend this candle warmer for yourself or for a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my daughter's college dorm!
reviews.reviewText: No flame allowed in a college dorm so this is a perfect alternative. It heated up the candle nicely so you get the scent without the worry of flame. Lamp is height adjustable so you can literally use any candle you have. We also tried it with wax scent melts and it worked just as well. Product came with 2 bulbs so that was nice. Beautiful and elegant look. Perfect gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this candle warmer! It is so pretty, and the aroma of the candle goes through the house. It is so pretty! I want to buy one for every room in the house. You can adjust the brightness of the light which makes for a great night light. Also has a timer for automatic shutoff. And I don't have to worry about accidentally leaving a candle burning. Highly recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more soot!
reviews.reviewText: Works great, safe option for candle-lighting without fire in your house. Provides a nice warm light to brighten a dark corner in my living room, and the timer feature means it will turn off on its own if I forget. I also have one in my office, and use the timer to signal the end of a work/study session.Also, love the fact that you don’t have to “burn” until the whole surface is liquid to avoid an uneven layer later. This warms it up evenly each time, so you avoid the whole wrap-around tinfoil business.
